file_content.text: Let us write the next chapter of your chronicle.
Our freakish reflexes are at your disposal.
We will record your every exploit for posterity.
To serve at your side is our highest calling.
Your summons is always cause for our celebration.
Do nothing historic unless we are present to witness it.
Very well. We await your next summons.
We will go record what we witnessed, while it remains fresh in our memory.
Farewell. Do not forget we are at your disposal.
We go now, to chronicle your growing legend.
We must not die until our work is complete.
You saved us. We are grateful.
We must hone our reflexes so this never happens again....
